title: [Bug]: Custom CSS not (fully?) applied when connecting as guest
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

`--customCSSName compactDark` only affects the loading screen, not the meeting itself

### What package are you using?

aur

### Version

1.12.5-1

### Reproduction steps

- Open a meeting using the `--customCSSName compactDark` command-line option (no Microsoft account)
- When loading, the screen is in dark mode for a moment. However, the "join meeting" screen is in light mode as usual, as is the actual meeting.

This *used* to work a few weeks ago, I think the CSS on the server side might have changed. Can anyone confirm the behavior? I'm not sure if there's an account setting on the server side that can affect this as well.

### Expected Behavior

Apply the dark theme also in the meeting itself.

### Debug log
